block.ognmarts.craft_occ.desp: Assembly line brutally extracting mineral cores. Feeds parameter blueprints into furnace – exports weapons trailing uncompiled errors.
block.ognmarts.inject_ept.desp: High-risk weapon mod station. Etching blades sparking on core codes could ignite oxygen – leaves operators' hands trembling like gripping power drills.
block.ognmarts.energy_eh.desp: Structure That Shouldn't Exist. Given this is a test version, ■■■■ seems fine granting you cheat privileges. She casually tapped the console and shoved this machine your way. Never. Charge. It. Fully.
item.ognmarts.ognm_shard.desp:
An Originium shard collected from heavily contaminated regions. 
Anyone who touches it has a high chance to get infected and even mutate. Therefore, it is a hazardous material as indicated in the Columbia CDC toxicity database.
item.ognmarts.orirock_cube.desp: With numerous micropores, it is often used in the interlayer of armors as an adsorbent of the breakdown product of Originium gas.
item.ognmarts.oriron.desp: In a small number of inerting processes, Oriron Shards may have phase changed and polymerized into Oriron. It is generally thought that Oriron is relatively stable when it reaches this level.
item.ognmarts.eu_simple.desp: Combat-ready instant-power core — don’t ask where the juice comes from.
item.ognmarts.eu_simple_empty.desp: Combat-ready instant-power core — though it appears to be empty now?
ogna.gui.craft.title: Origin Core Compiler (OCC)
ogna.gui.inject.title: Etching Protocol Terminal (EPT)
ogna.gui.energy.title: En■ro■y Hu■ (■■)
ogna.genable.chip.missing.name: <Module MISSING>
ogna.genable.weapon.missing.name: <WEAPON MISSING>
ogna.genable.skill.missing.name: <SKILL MISSING>
ogna.genable.weapon.staff.lockkey.name: "Black Lock and White Key"
ogna.genable.weapon.staff.lockkey.desp: Until one day, footsteps echoed throughout, as three Sankta walked into the underground palace.
ogna.genable.weapon.staff.sheep.name: "Missed Sounds"
ogna.genable.weapon.staff.sheep.desp: "We never know if this goodbye might be forever, and we can't know how to say goodbye to you under such circumstances."
ogna.genable.weapon.sword.lwd.name: Laevatain
ogna.genable.weapon.sword.lwd.desp:
She knew it was a seething, scorching sort, easy to irritate, hated cold things the way one might hate the sound of nails on a chalkboard.
It was why she'd always loved ice cream, and all cold refreshments alike.
ogna.genable.weapon.sword.jc.name: Sand Corrosion
ogna.genable.weapon.sword.jc.desp:
"Just a mop, nothing to be afraid of."
"No, that mop always has a pungent smell of disinfectant, extremely unpleasant. Even the water droplets it flings out are corrosive."
ogna.genable.skill.key_of_chronology.des: Hm? I thought I missed a few, but I guess that's a job well done.
ogna.genable.skill.twilight.name: Twilight
ogna.genable.skill.volcano.name: Volcano
ogna.genable.skill.destreza.name: Destreza
ogna.genable.skill.destreza.desp: Don't blink, this is the Destreza of Iberia!
ogna.genable.chip.atk.1.name: Attack UP Module I
ogna.genable.chip.atk.1.desp: Retired Lab Toy. Pries a gap in the Originium core—hold it too long and your hand goes numb like grabbing a live wire.
ogna.genable.chip.consume.1.name: Energy-Save Module I
ogna.genable.chip.consume.1.desp: Intern's Power-Saving Plan. The Originium core dozes off and leaks dregs. Lasts like a rusty pocket watch—literally.
ogna.genable.chip.store.1.name: Energy-Storage Module I
ogna.genable.chip.store.1.desp: Old Medical PSU Conversion. Charges slow, leaks fast. Like a leaky can of energy.
ogna.genable.chip.inner.sand_poison.name: Nerve Corrosion
ogna.genable.chip.inner.sand_poison.cont: Poisons the targets when attacking, dealing 1.5 (+1 per level) damage per 20 (-5 per level) ticks (damage is doubled against Ranged enemies)
ogna.tip.chip.inner.mobEffect: Apply Effect %s (Lv%d) to the target with duration %.1fs.
